title: Amethyst and Aquamarine Navratna Haaram - A Timeless Treasure
materials: Polki Diamonds. Features a signature Hyderabadi polish for a lasting luster.
features: This exquisite haaram blends traditional South Indian elements with a contemporary aesthetic. The circular motifs are set with round cut emeralds and polki diamonds. Graduated aquamarine drops add a touch of modern elegance, while the amethyst stones (oval on top and pear-shaped below) add a regal touch. Handcrafted with intricate detailing and a focus on gemstone quality.
occasions: or any special occasion where you want to make a statement. Equally stunning for formal gatherings or elegant celebrations.
description: This haaram is a true investment piece, combining the timeless appeal of South Indian jewelry with contemporary design sensibilities. The use of high-quality gemstones and expert craftsmanship ensures durability and lasting beauty. The Navratna influence brings good fortune and prosperity, making it a meaningful and cherished heirloom. The Hyderabadi polish ensures a rich, lasting glow.
